title: The Nether
description: Small and completely unfinished strategy(?) game about conflicts between two races.

Play as either of them (Dark'ans, from the "Dark World", or Light'ans, from the "Light World"), defend yourself from attacks from nether creatures, and try to uncover who's behind those attacks. Except, that last part wasn't implemented...
This isn't a game as much as it's a "(bad) pathfinder for 2D platformers" prototype...
